short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A customizable Gitlab dashboard. Monitor multiple projects issues, pipelines, merge requests and more every time you open a browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Track issues, pipelines, merge requests, and contributions at a glance all from your new tab. Save time by always having access to the most important details you need from Gitlab. Customize your dashboard with all the things you need. Working on multiple projects? Add as many as you like. Track pipelines from all of your projects all in a single place in one clean UI.

Key Features:
 - Track multiple projects all in one place
 - Monitor pipelines, issues, merge requests, and metrics for all of your projects
 - Add custom links for quick access to everything else you need
 - Light and Dark Mode
 - Drag and drop to organize your dashboard however you like

To use the extension, you'll enter the base url for your gitlab instance and an API key with api_read permissions. You API key is only ever stored in your browser. It is never sent to any third party services. Once you've entered your configuration details, simply add the projects you want to track and then choose what tiles you want for each project on your dashboard.
